<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 585 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

Weapons with _wounding_ runes are said to thirst for blood. When you hit a creature with a _wounding_ weapon, you deal an extra 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).
